title: As a User, I want to Transfer a player from the Development List to an Injured List
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a player with status: Development List
custom_steps: WHEN user transfers player to 7 day or 60 day injured list
custom_expected:
THEN Player status will update to '7 Day IL' or '60 Day IL'
AND  Time served on the Development List will count toward the 7-day or 60-day required minimums of those lists
AND  Player History will update (TBD)

title: As a a User, I want to see the Development List Reinstatement Date populated on the Inactive List widget
custom_steps: AC:* When a player is placed on the Development List, the Reinstatement Date from the transaction will appear in the Earliest Reinstatement column of the "Players on Inactive List‰Û� widget

title: As a user I want to see the earliest reinstatement date on the Development List transaction
custom_steps: The players earliest reinstatement from the development list should be displayed on the transaction and should be correctly calculated to be 7 days from their placement date.BOC users can update the date, if necessaryAC* Development list transaction has a new 'Earliest Reinstatement date" field* The value is calculated as 7 days from the placement date* The Reinstatement Date will be editable by BOC Admin Users* The date displayed here should be used on the reinstate from IL transaction to determine if the player has spent enough time on the list (in case BOC changes the value)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want time spent on the Dev List to count towards 4th Option requirement
custom_steps: AC:* Time on the DEVEL List will count the same as if on the Active List and will count toward the 90 day requirement for a season of service for the 4th option.* Treat this as a TI transaction (service wise) + the above 4th Option* Option Tracking Batch and/or Seasons of Service Batch
